name: Robot.Start - Puzzle Game
description:
In this puzzle game, play as an agile robot whose duty is to turn on the facility computers.

To do so, all activation buttons in each area must be/remain pressed.

Find a way to reach each button and access the next area!

  • Handcrafted levels with increasing complexity.
  • Sokoban elements.
  • Robot moves in 4 directions, gliding just above the ground.
